About Interconnecx

Your trusted hosting partner since 2009. Delivering enterprise-grade infrastructure solutions with unmatched reliability and support.

Our Story

Founded in 2009, Interconnecx LLC has been at the forefront of the hosting industry for over 15 years. What started as a small operation in Detroit, Michigan has grown into a trusted infrastructure provider serving thousands of businesses across the globe.

We specialize in providing enterprise-class dedicated servers, virtual private servers, and colocation services from our state-of-the-art Tier 3 data centers. Our commitment to excellence has made us a preferred partner for businesses that demand reliability, performance, and exceptional support.

Today, we operate 3 data centers across the United States, ensuring low latency and high availability for our clients nationwide.

Mission & Values

We're committed to providing reliable, high-performance hosting solutions that empower businesses to succeed online.

Reliability First

Our infrastructure is built with redundancy at every level, ensuring your services stay online when you need them most.

Customer Focused

We believe in building lasting relationships with our clients through exceptional service and support available 24/7/365.

Innovation Driven

We continuously invest in the latest technology and infrastructure to deliver cutting-edge solutions for modern businesses.
